episodios.nome: To You, in 2000 Years: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 1
episodios.descricao: A humanidade recebe um lembrete brutal de que eles estão ameaçados pelos titãs.

episodios.nome: That Day: The Fall of Shiganshina, Part 2
episodios.descricao: Eren jura que ele vai matar todos os titãs e vingar toda a humanidade.

episodios.nome: A Dim Light Amid Despair: Humanity's Comeback, Part 1
episodios.descricao: Enquanto a humanidade organiza uma nova resistência, Eren encontra motivação para lutar.

episodios.nome: The Night of the Closing Ceremony: Humanity's Comeback, Part 2
episodios.descricao: Os novos recrutas tomam suas posições enquanto os titãs começam uma nova ofensiva.

episodios.nome: First Battle: The Struggle for Trost, Part 1
episodios.descricao: Eren enfrenta a realidade da luta contra os titãs depois de juntar-se ao esforço de guerra.

episodios.nome: The World the Girl Saw: The Struggle for Trost, Part 2
episodios.descricao: A visão da batalha através dos olhos de Mikasa revela um passado compartilhado.

episodios.nome: Small Blade: The Struggle for Trost, Part 3
episodios.descricao: A luta para defender Trost se intensifica enquanto os recrutas enfrentam perdas devastadoras.

episodios.nome: I Can Hear His Heartbeat: The Struggle for Trost, Part 4
episodios.descricao: A equipe de Eren descobre uma nova tática que pode dar-lhes uma vantagem crucial.

episodios.nome: Whereabouts of His Left Arm: The Struggle for Trost, Part 5
episodios.descricao: O mistério sobre o poder de Eren começa a se revelar enquanto a batalha continua.

episodios.nome: Response: The Struggle for Trost, Part 6
episodios.descricao: As respostas sobre os titãs podem oferecer novas estratégias para a humanidade.

episodios.nome: Idol: The Struggle for Trost, Part 7
episodios.descricao: As crenças de Eren são testadas quando ele tenta controlar seu poder transformador.

episodios.nome: Wound: The Struggle for Trost, Part 8
episodios.descricao: A recuperação de Eren traz novas complexidades para a luta contra os titãs.

descricaoGeral: A humanidade luta pela sobrevivência contra gigantes devoradores de homens.

episodios.descricao: Naruto makes mischief around the village to get attention while preparing for his graduation from the Ninja Academy.
Naruto befriends Konohamaru, and the two bond over their struggles to live up to expectations.

episodios.nome: Sasuke and Sakura: Friends or Foes?
episodios.descricao: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura are teamed up and begin to learn the dynamics of teamwork.
New instructor Kakashi challenges Team 7 with a nearly impossible task to test their limits and skills.
The team faces the possibility of failure as Kakashi makes a critical decision about their future.

episodios.nome: A Dangerous Mission! Journey to the Land of Waves!
episodios.descricao: Team 7 receives their first major mission, taking them beyond the safe confines of the village.
While on a mission, Team 7 encounters Zabuza, the ruthless assassin from the Mist.
The battle with Zabuza intensifies, pushing the team to a new understanding of what it means to be a ninja.
The secrets of Kakashi's Sharingan are revealed as he battles to protect his students.
Naruto and his team learn to better control their chakra under Kakashi's guidance.

episodios.nome: The Land Where a Hero Once Lived
episodios.descricao: Sakura reflects on what it means to be a ninja and the legacy of the village's heroes.

episodios.nome: Battle on the Bridge! Zabuza Returns!!
episodios.descricao: The confrontation with Zabuza reaches a climax, challenging Naruto and his friends like never before.

descricaoGeral: A young ninja dreams of becoming the greatest Hokage in his village.

episodios.descricao: Izuku Midoriya desperately wants to be a hero, but he is one of the few in his generation born without a Quirk.

episodios.nome: What It Takes to Be a Hero
episodios.descricao: Izuku accidentally learns of All Might's secret, but there's trouble in town again before Izuku has time to process it.
All Might tells Izuku that he can become a hero, but does he really have what it takes to become one?
Izuku's first day at U.A. High School throws him directly into the Hero Course action.

episodios.nome: What I Can Do for Now
episodios.descricao: With his new power, Izuku manages to catch up to the rest of his classmates.
The training to become the strongest hero is tough and not all can keep up with it.
A fight breaks out between the two childhood friends: Izuku and Bakugo.
Bakugo's anger gets the best of him during the training session.

episodios.nome: Yeah, Just Do Your Best, Iida!
episodios.descricao: Class 1-A works on developing their Quirks and creating ultimate moves to get ready for the provisional hero licensing exam.
Villains attack U.A. High School during the training session, putting everyone in danger.
The heroes fight desperately against villains to protect their school and their friends.
All Might fights with everything he's got to protect his students from harm.

descricao: Em um mundo de superpoderes, um jovem sem poderes sonha em ser herói.

episodios.nome: I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!
episodios.descricao: Luffy sets out on his adventure to find the legendary treasure, One Piece.

episodios.nome: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!
episodios.descricao: Luffy encounters and befriends Zoro, the feared swordsman.

episodios.nome: Morgan vs. Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?
episodios.descricao: Luffy and his new friend Zoro fight against the corrupt Marine Captain Morgan.
Luffy's motivations and past connections with the pirate Shanks are revealed.

episodios.nome: Fear, Mysterious Power! Pirate Clown Captain Buggy!
episodios.descricao: The crew encounters Captain Buggy, a pirate with the ability to separate his body parts.

episodios.nome: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!
episodios.descricao: Luffy faces off against Mohji and his powerful lion.

episodios.nome: Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!
episodios.descricao: Zoro battles Cabaji in a fierce fight.

episodios.nome: Who is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!
episodios.descricao: Luffy and Buggy demonstrate the powers of their Devil Fruits in a climactic battle.
The crew meets Usopp, a local villager with a penchant for lying.

episodios.nome: The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!
episodios.descricao: The crew faces Jango, a hypnotist who uses his powers for crime.

episodios.nome: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!
episodios.descricao: The crew uncovers a sinister plot by Captain Kuro, a pirate posing as a butler.

episodios.nome: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!
episodios.descricao: A massive battle ensues between the Straw Hat Pirates and the Black Cat Pirates.

descricao: Luffy e seus amigos navegam pelos mares em busca do tesouro lendário, o One Piece.

episodios.descricao: Tanjiro's peaceful life is shattered when a demon slaughters his family and leaves his sister Nezuko transformed.
Tanjiro meets his new master and begins his training to join the Demon Slayer Corps.
Through rigorous trials, Tanjiro learns the Water Breathing technique, guided by the mysterious children Sabito and Makomo.
Tanjiro faces the final selection test that will determine his future as a Demon Slayer.
Tanjiro completes his training and earns his own demon slayer sword.
Tanjiro begins his first mission and encounters a demon with a grudge against the Demon Slayer Corps.
Tanjiro encounters Muzan Kibutsuji, the demon responsible for his family's tragedy.
The scent of blood leads Tanjiro to another deadly encounter with a demon.
Tanjiro battles two powerful demons who challenge his Water Breathing techniques.
With the help of his sister Nezuko, Tanjiro fights to protect the innocent.
Tanjiro and his companions find themselves trapped in a mysterious mansion.

episodios.nome: The Boar Bares Its Fangs, Zenitsu Sleeps
episodios.descricao: A new ally and a new challenge arise as Tanjiro tries to escape the dangerous maze of the mansion.

descricao: Tanjiro luta para salvar sua irmã e vingar sua família destruída por demônios.

episodios.descricao: Light Yagami discovers the Death Note and tests its powers on criminals.
L, the world-renowned detective, suspects that Kira is located in Japan and a psychological duel begins.
Light decides to create a perfect world and plans to use the Death Note to eradicate criminals.
L closes in on Kira by deploying surveillance cameras and wiretaps in the Kanto region.
Light must find a way to protect his identity while under the watchful eyes of surveillance.
Light meets a woman with an urgent message about the Death Note.
Light manipulates events to gain more information about the people investigating him.
Light and L finally meet, and suspicions lead to strategies to catch one another.
Light struggles to mask his manipulation of the Death Note while he and L grow closer.
The investigation team discusses the ethics of using the Death Note to kill criminals.
A new Kira appears, complicating Light's plans and adding a new layer of danger.
Misa Amane, a popular idol and Kira supporter, encounters Light and reveals her own Death Note.

descricao: Um estudante encontra um caderno que lhe permite matar qualquer pessoa ao escrever seu nome.

episodios.descricao: Kaneki's date with Rize takes a dark turn, changing his life forever.
Kaneki struggles to adapt to his new nature as a half-ghoul.
Kaneki and Touka face the threat of investigators from the CCG.
Tensions rise within Anteiku as ghouls and humans clash.
Kaneki wrestles with the monster he's becoming.
A violent rainstorm brings fresh conflicts to the 20th Ward.
Kaneki finds himself held captive by a sadistic ghoul.
Kaneki's search for allies leads him to an underground group.
Kaneki tries to protect his friends as the CCG tightens their grip.
Kaneki is forced to make a choice that will define his path.
Kaneki embraces his new identity.
Kaneki confronts the reality of the world he lives in.

descricao: Um estudante se transforma em meio-ghoul e luta para sobreviver em um mundo de monstros.

episodios.descricao: Gon starts his journey to become a Hunter and meet his father.
Gon and his new friends face their first challenges in the Hunter Exam.
The Hunter Exam heats up as Gon's group faces formidable rivals.
The candidates are pushed to their limits in a grueling test.
Gon encounters Hisoka, a dangerous and unpredictable contestant.
The participants face a surprise challenge that tests their resolve.

episodios.nome: Showdown x On x The Airship
episodios.descricao: Tensions rise as the first phase of the exam comes to a close.
The candidates must make difficult decisions to advance in the exam.
Gon's team faces convicts in the next phase of the exam.

episodios.nome: Trick x To x The Trick
episodios.descricao: Clever thinking is required to pass the latest test.

episodios.nome: Trouble x With x The Gamble
episodios.descricao: A gambling match poses new challenges for the team.

episodios.nome: Last x Test x Of x Resolve!
episodios.descricao: The final test of the Hunter Exam begins, with unexpected twists.

descricao: Gon embarca em uma jornada para se tornar um caçador e encontrar seu pai.

episodios.descricao: Kirito logs into the game world where he and ten thousand others must face the reality of their situation.
Kirito gains a reputation as a solo player and encounters Asuna.
Kirito deals with the emotional aftermath of Sachi's death.
Kirito encounters a mysterious NPC and gains a new ally.
A murder mystery within the game threatens player safety.
Kirito and Asuna investigate a series of murders linked to a player guild.
Asuna and Kirito share a personal moment that deepens their bond.

episodios.nome: The Sword Dance of Black and White
episodios.descricao: Kirito and Asuna face a new enemy that tests their limits.
The front lines of the game become even more dangerous.
Asuna's leadership skills are put to the test as they face a powerful boss.
Kirito and Asuna take a break from the front lines to enjoy some downtime.
Kirito and Asuna encounter Yui, a mysterious child with no memories.

descricao: Jogadores ficam presos em um MMORPG mortal e precisam lutar para sobreviver.

episodios.descricao: The Elric brothers begin their quest for the Philosopher's Stone to regain what they've lost.
Edward and Alphonse's journey leads them to confront their past.
The brothers uncover a religious fraud in Liore while searching for the Stone.
The brothers encounter a fellow alchemist who has made a horrific discovery.
A revelation about their mother's death pushes Ed and Al to their emotional limits.
The Elrics meet an important figure from their father's past.
Edward and Alphonse discover a deep state conspiracy that threatens their mission.
A lead takes the Elric brothers to a sinister laboratory where secrets about the Stone are revealed.
The brothers grapple with the moral implications of their quest for the Stone.
Edward and Alphonse's paths diverge as they each find a different clue.
The brothers witness the real-life miracles of alchemy.

episodios.nome: One is All, All is One
episodios.descricao: Training under Izumi Curtis, the brothers learn a harsh alchemical lesson.

descricao: Dois irmãos alquimistas procuram a pedra filosofal para restaurar seus corpos.

episodios.nome: Stage 01: The Day a New Demon was Born
episodios.descricao: Lelouch Lamperouge, a Britannian student, unexpectedly gains the power of Geass and uses it to begin his rebellion.
Lelouch directs his newfound powers towards the Britannian forces, plotting a rebellion.
Lelouch maneuvers through political intrigue and tests the limits of his power.
Zero makes his first public appearance, challenging the legitimacy of Britannia.

episodios.nome: Stage 05: The Princess and the Witch
episodios.descricao: Zero starts to gather allies around him as the rebellion grows in strength.
The identity of Zero starts causing trouble for Lelouch's everyday life.
Zero's group undertakes a risky operation to capture Cornelia.
Lelouch forms his own army called the Black Knights.
The consequences of the drug Refrain come to light, affecting someone close to Lelouch.
A new powerful mech, the Guren, appears on the battlefield.
The Black Knights engage in a major battle at Narita.
Zero receives an important offer from the Kyoto Group.

descricao: Um jovem ganha um poder especial e decide liderar uma rebelião contra o Império.

episodios.descricao: Saitama appears as a hero that can defeat any opponent with a single punch, but he is bored by his overwhelming strength.
Genos, a cyborg who wants to be Saitama's disciple, appears and they team up.
Saitama and Genos encounter a scientist who has been turning himself into a monster.
Saitama takes on Speed-o'-Sound Sonic, a ninja who is looking for worthy opponents.
Saitama and Genos join the Hero Association to gain official recognition.
Rumors about the dangerousness of City Z circulate and investigations begin.
Genos receives a significant upgrade to battle against new threats.
A formidable enemy from the sea emerges, challenging the Hero Association.
Saitama faces off against the Deep Sea King to protect the innocent.
A new and unprecedented threat appears, challenging the entire Hero Association.
Saitama encounters an alien invader who is destroying cities.
Saitama faces his strongest enemy yet and hopes to find a challenge.

descricao: Um herói que derrota qualquer inimigo com um soco busca um adversário digno.

episodios.nome: The Day I Became a Shinigami
episodios.descricao: Ichigo Kurosaki, a teenager with the ability to see ghosts, gains the powers of a Soul Reaper.
Ichigo begins his duties as a Soul Reaper and learns about the responsibilities it carries.

episodios.nome: The Older Brother's Wish, the Younger Sister's Wish
episodios.descricao: Ichigo encounters a hollow seeking his sister.
Ichigo rescues a boy whose soul is trapped in a cursed parakeet.
Ichigo battles an unseen enemy threatening his new friend.

episodios.nome: Fight to the Death! Ichigo vs. Ichigo
episodios.descricao: A malignant spirit possesses Ichigo's body, causing chaos.
A mod soul takes over a stuffed lion, creating unexpected chaos.
Ichigo faces painful memories on the anniversary of his mother's death.
A powerful new enemy challenges Ichigo's resolve.

episodios.nome: Assault on Trip at Sacred Ground!
episodios.descricao: Ichigo and his friends protect a group of spirits from a gang of soul reapers.
Ichigo meets a Quincy, a clan of spiritual warriors, and learns about their history.
The powers of Ichigo's friend, Orihime, awaken during a battle.

descricao: Um jovem com poderes espirituais luta contra almas perdidas para proteger o mundo humano.

episodios.descricao: Lucy Heartfilia joins the Fairy Tail guild and meets Natsu Dragneel, a fire-breathing wizard.
Natsu and Lucy embark on their first mission together to retrieve a stolen book.
Lucy and Natsu tackle an influential client's corrupt request.
The team uncovers the truth behind a deceptively simple mission.
Erza, a powerful member of Fairy Tail, returns to guide the team on a dangerous journey.
The Fairy Tail members participate in a magical exam on a mysterious island.
Natsu and the team face a formidable enemy with control over wind.
Natsu, Lucy, and Erza form a powerful alliance for a challenging battle.
The group encounters a village with a unique problem that only Natsu can solve.
A friendly rivalry heats up between Natsu and Erza.
A relaxing vacation turns dangerous as dark forces surround the guild members.
The team races against time to stop a sinister plot during a lunar ritual.

descricao: Magos de uma guilda poderosa enfrentam inimigos e formam laços profundos de amizade.

episodios.descricao: Spike and Jet's first adventure. They are hunting an ex-gangster who's on the run.
The duo is after a runaway experimental animal with a valuable microchip.
Faye Valentine joins the crew after a casino heist intertwines their fates.
Facing eco-terrorists, the crew of the Bebop must prevent a biological disaster.
Spike's past comes back to haunt him as he goes after a member of the Red Dragon Syndicate.
A seemingly immortal child teaches Spike about the hardships of growing old.
Space truckers and a missing explosive device put the Bebop crew in danger.
Spike is on a mission to find a rare medicine on Venus.
The crew meets a bizarre hacker prodigy who can track down any signal.
Jet faces his past and a former love while tracking a bounty.
A strange organism aboard the Bebop brings danger to the crew.
The crew splits up after a fallout, leading to individual confrontations.

descricao: Caçadores de recompensas no espaço navegam por perigos em um universo cyberpunk.

episodios.descricao: Jonathan Joestar's life turns tumultuous with the arrival of his ambitious new brother, Dio Brando.
Jonathan discovers Dio's dark intentions and seeks to stop him.
As Dio gains power, Jonathan trains under the mysterious Ripple technique.
Jonathan puts his new abilities to the test against Dio's vampiric powers.
Dio returns with an army of the undead to confront Jonathan.
The Joestar group faces off against Dio's strongest warriors.
A tragic loss pushes Jonathan to his limits.
A final showdown between Jonathan and Dio decides their fates.
Jonathan uses everything he has learned to end the battle with Dio.
Years later, a new generation of Joestars continues the fight against evil.
Joseph Joestar, the new hero, faces off against a psychic foe.
An ancient being awakens, posing a new threat to the world.

descricao: Cada geração da família Joestar luta contra forças sobrenaturais e o destino.

episodios.nome: What is Evil? Whatever Springs from Weakness.
episodios.descricao: Ayanokouji Kiyotaka enters an elite school and hides his abilities to observe his classmates.

episodios.nome: It takes a great talent and skill to conceal one's talent and skill.
episodios.descricao: Class D receives a poor grade in their first exam, prompting Ayanokouji to subtly influence his peers.

episodios.nome: Man is an animal that makes bargains: no other animal does this - no dog exchanges bones with another.
episodios.descricao: Class D learns about the S-System and starts to form alliances.

episodios.nome: We should not be upset that others hide the truth from us, when we hide it so often from ourselves.
episodios.descricao: Ayanokouji begins to uncover the secrets of the school and its students.
The class faces their first group test, and their darkest sides begin to emerge.

episodios.nome: There are two kinds of lies; one concerns an accomplished fact, the other concerns a future duty.
episodios.descricao: Ayanokouji manipulates a situation to help a classmate, revealing his strategic nature.

episodios.nome: Nothing is as dangerous as an ignorant friend; a wise enemy is to be preferred.
episodios.descricao: Ayanokouji faces challenges both from within and outside his class.

episodios.nome: Abandon all hope, ye who enter here.
episodios.descricao: A school cruise introduces new trials that threaten Class D's unity.

episodios.nome: Man is condemned to be free.
episodios.descricao: The students confront the consequences of their choices on the cruise.

episodios.nome: Every man has in himself the most dangerous traitor of all.
episodios.descricao: A traitor in Class D threatens to unravel Ayanokouji's plans.

episodios.nome: What people commonly call fate is mostly their own stupidity.
episodios.descricao: As the end of the year approaches, Class D faces the possibility of expulsion.

episodios.nome: Genius lives only one story above madness.
episodios.descricao: Ayanokouji sets a plan in motion to secure his and his classmates' futures.

descricao: Em uma escola de elite onde o mérito é tudo, um aluno misterioso e solitário manobra para superar os desafios e adversidades com frieza e cálculo.

episodios.descricao: Kouichi Sakakibara transfers to Yomiyama North Middle School and senses something horrifying in his new class.
Kouichi discovers an old class photo and starts to unravel the grim mystery tied to his classmates.
The specter of death begins to haunt Class 3-3 as students start dying under mysterious circumstances.
Kouichi probes deeper into the curse of Class 3-3 and meets Mei Misaki, a student everyone else ignores.
Kouichi and Mei form a bond as they work together to stop the curse before it claims more lives.
The history of the curse is revealed, and the deaths grow more gruesome.
As the cultural festival approaches, the curse's grip tightens, leading to a critical situation.
Kouichi and his friends find a tape that might explain how to stop the curse.
The students try to perform a ritual to calm the vengeful spirit but face deadly consequences.
The curse's origin is traced back to a tragic event involving a previous class.
Kouichi learns the dark truth about the curse and its ties to Mei Misaki.
The students confront the curse in a final attempt to stop the killings and save themselves.

descricao: Em 1972, um aluno popular morre tragicamente durante o ano letivo. Em 1998, um estudante chamado Kouichi Sakakibara transfere-se para a classe que parece esconder um terrível segredo e se depara com um mistério envolvendo mortes horríveis e sobrenaturais.
